mapper.select:
SELECT EZC_MENU.MENU_ID AS menuId /* 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */ ,EZC_MENU.HIGH_MENU_ID AS highMenuId /* 상위 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */ ,EZC_MENU.MENU_LEVEL AS menuLevel /* 메뉴 레벨, VARCHAR2(18) */ ,EZC_MENU.MENU_NM AS menuNm /* 메뉴 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_MENU.MENU_URL AS menuUrl /* 메뉴 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_MENU.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MENU.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_MENU.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MENU.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MENU.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MENU.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MENU /* 메뉴 정보 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_MENU.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_MENU.MENU_ID = #{menuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6), EZC_MENU_PK(P),SYS_C0011472(C) */ AND EZC_MENU.HIGH_MENU_ID = #{highMenuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상위 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6), FK_EZC_MENU_EZC_MENU(R) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_MENU /* 메뉴 정보 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_MENU.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_MENU.MENU_ID = #{menuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */
AND EZC_MENU.HIGH_MENU_ID = #{highMenuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상위 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */
AND EZC_MENU.MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 레벨, VARCHAR2(18) */
AND EZC_MENU.MENU_NM = #{menuNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 명, VARCHAR2(50) */
AND EZC_MENU.MENU_URL = #{menuUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */
AND EZC_MENU.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MENU.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MENU.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MENU.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MENU.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_MENU.MENU_ID AS menuId /* 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */ ,EZC_MENU.HIGH_MENU_ID AS highMenuId /* 상위 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */ ,EZC_MENU.MENU_LEVEL AS menuLevel /* 메뉴 레벨, VARCHAR2(18) */ ,EZC_MENU.MENU_NM AS menuNm /* 메뉴 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_MENU.MENU_URL AS menuUrl /* 메뉴 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_MENU.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MENU.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_MENU.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MENU.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MENU.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MENU.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MENU /* 메뉴 정보 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_MENU.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_MENU.MENU_ID = #{menuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */
AND EZC_MENU.HIGH_MENU_ID = #{highMenuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상위 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */
AND EZC_MENU.MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 레벨, VARCHAR2(18) */
AND EZC_MENU.MENU_NM = #{menuNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 명, VARCHAR2(50) */
AND EZC_MENU.MENU_URL = #{menuUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */
AND EZC_MENU.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MENU.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MENU.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MENU.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MENU.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_MENU.MENU_ID DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_MENU SET /* 메뉴 정보 */ MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 레벨, VARCHAR2(18) */ ,MENU_NM = #{menuNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,MENU_URL = #{menuUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND MENU_ID = #{menuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */ AND HIGH_MENU_ID = #{highMenuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상위 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_MENU /* 메뉴 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND MENU_ID = #{menuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */ AND HIGH_MENU_ID = #{highMenuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상위 메뉴 ID, VARCHAR2(6) */
